publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2790# Mr Jamie McGrigor: Environmentally Designated Areas—That the Parliament notes with alarm concerns expressed by local communities highlighted by recent petitions to the public petitions committee (PE462 to 464) about procedures and scientific data used by Scottish Natural Heritage (SNH) for environmentally designated areas, such as Special Protection Areas, Special Areas of Conservation and Sites of Special Scientific Interest and believes that a programme of comprehensive consultation will result in more effective participation and co-operation between SNH and local people within the proposed areas of designation, which will result in better relations between SNH and local communities. Supported by: Phil Gallie*, Murdo Fraser*, Mr David Davidson*, Alex Fergusson*, John Scott*, John Young*, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*
